Html:
Hi

What happens when a new version of one of the libraries is released? is it possible to swap out the old one or do we have to wait for Chirpy to include the update?

James

Download source code and build on you computer.

Libraries is package in main dll with post-build event.

"$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)\ILMerge" /out:"$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)Chirpy.dll" "$(TargetPath)" "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)EcmaScript.NET.modified.dll" "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)Yahoo.YUI.Compressor.dll" "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)dotless.Core.dll" "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)AjaxMin.dll" "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)UglifyCS.dll" "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)Jurassic.dll"
"$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)7za.exe" u Chirpy.zip "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)Chirpy.dll" "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)Chirpy.vscontent" "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)Zippy.AddIn"
 rename "$(ProjectDir)$(OutDir)Chirpy.zip" "Chirpy.vsi"
